name: SHIFT (itch) (alexandrabjarg)
description:
featuring sphere friend 

a reflection is something bending or bouncing - shifting - back to you: light, sound or even your own thoughts.

WASD to move
ESC to stop reflecting

take a moment to explore.  sphere friend is right behind you.

music credit:

"Spacial Harvest" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
